Caregiver Sims are driven by their empathy and compassion to protect and care. Unfortunately, others can exploit their good nature for their own ends.

Sims Protocols is a feature that allows you to alter Sims behavior by defining their privileges and restrictions. How to use Sims Protocols? 1. Create a Protocol and select which Sims are supposed to be affected by it. 2. Set the rules that the selected Sims are required to obey. 3. Consider changing the name and icon for easier recognition of the newly created Protocol. And you're done. Now watch Sims in the game obey the rules of the newly created Protocol. Take your time and read all of the descriptions to better understand what each function and rule does. Using Protocols is completely optional and not required to enjoy playing with WickedWhims.

A sex animation is playing that you don't like? Here's how to quickly disable it.

While Sims are having sex, hold the Shift key on your keyboard and click with your mouse (Shift+Click) on a Sim to display the secret menu.

Under the 'Wicked' category you will find the 'Disable Currently Playing Animation' interaction which will disable the currently playing sex animation. This sex animation will remain disabled until manually enabled in the 'Specific Animations Disabler' menu.

A sex animation is missing appropriate context tags? Here's how to fix that.

While Sims are having sex, hold the Shift key on your keyboard and click with your mouse (Shift+Click) on a Sim to display the secret menu.

Under the 'Wicked' category you will find the 'Modify Currently Playing Animation Tags' interaction which will display a menu with all available context tags.
Within this menu select the tags you find appropriate for the sex animation and confirm your selections.

A sex animation is making Sims do the wrong actions? Here's how to fix that.

While Sims are having sex, hold the Shift key on your keyboard and click with your mouse (Shift+Click) on a Sim to display the secret menu.

Under the 'Wicked' category you will find the 'Modify Currently Playing Animation Roles' interaction which will display a menu with present Sims as actors performing roles.
Select the actor role that you believe is incorrect and change its gender role to one that seems correct. Next time you use this sex animation it will assign roles the way you configured it.

Want to build a playlist of animations efficiently? Here's an easy way to do it.

Begin a sex interaction and play animations you might like. If you like the sex animation that's currently playing, click with your mouse on a Sim and go into 'Sex -> Playlist -> Add Current Animation to Playlist' which will display a menu with playlists.
Within the playlists menu you can either create a new playlist or add the sex animation to an existing playlist.

Sims are using a location for sex but you don't like it? Here's how to solve it.

First make sure Sims aren't having sex, then click with your mouse on the object and go into 'Wicked -> Sex Control'.

Under the 'Sex Control' category you will find different options to adjust sex autonomy for that object and selecting the 'Exclude Object from Sex Autonomy' interaction will prevent that object from being used by Sex Autonomy. Repeat this process to enable back the sex autonomy on this object.

A Sim is having sex but you don't want them to do it? Here's how to solve it.

First make sure Sims aren't having sex, then hold the Shift key on your keyboard and click with your mouse (Shift+Click) on the Sim to display the secret menu.

Under the 'Wicked' category you will find the 'Sex' category and in it the 'Disable Sim for Sex Autonomy' interaction which will prevent that Sim from participating in Sex Autonomy. Repeat this process to enable back the sex autonomy on this Sim.

Looks like WickedWhims complex save data failed to be processed. Why did this happen? • Your operating system or other applications might be altering The Sims 4 files access permissions which could be preventing reading save file data. Majority of WickedWhims save data doesn't depend on complex save data file, so you can continue playing, but some features might be missing progress.

Looks like WickedWhims complex save data failed to be loaded. Why did this happen? • WickedWhims complex save data appears to be corrupted. Majority of WickedWhims save data doesn't depend on complex save data file, so you can continue playing, but some features might be missing progress.

Looks like WickedWhims complex save data failed to be saved. Why did this happen? • Get support to receive help with reading the lastException file. You can try waiting a few seconds and save again but if this issue repeats then you need the problem to be investigated.

Looks like WickedWhims complex save data failed to be saved. Why did this happen? • Something prevented creation of a Sims Household (Mod or Game). Creation of a Household is a critical part of saving WickedWhims data. You can try waiting a few seconds and save again but if this issue repeats then you need the problem to be investigated.

Looks like WickedWhims complex save data failed to be saved. Why did this happen? • Something prevented creation of a Sim (Mod or Game). Creation of a Sim is a critical part of saving WickedWhims data. You can try waiting a few seconds and save again but if this issue repeats then you need the problem to be investigated.
